H0.text: Where in Scotland is Dunvegan Castle. Loch Ness

H1.text: Where in Scotland is Dunvegan Castle. Inverness

H2.text: Where in Scotland is Dunvegan Castle. Aberdeen

H3.text: Where in Scotland is Dunvegan Castle. Skye

A4.text: Dunvegan Castle is located 1 mile (1.6 km) to the north of Dunvegan on the Isle of Skye, off the west coast of Scotland.
